channel.title: Auto save as in saving the char file
channel.description: ok on your run.bat when someone is on and it auto saves it says "auto saved game" well in my message system i made it save but it erases what i had how can i make it save for the char like the character save does??

item.title: Auto save as in saving the char file
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

not to be harsh but…
BITCH you aint gots no clue what your talking about…
this is all serverside
i need a code that keeps from saving a file if one already exists…
(i am joking with the above statment)

Read full topic
item.source: Auto save as in saving the char file

item.title: Auto save as in saving the char file
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

Hm… if they’re using a different client, it may bring major bugs during gameplay. I suggest you find a stable client.
For an example, the source my server runs on is StabbingScape Source.
They have a client, in which you can download and all the bugs are gone.

I had the same problem when I used Silab client, I tried to go to KQ, and it saved over as a new player.

Read full topic
item.source: Auto save as in saving the char file

item.title: Auto save as in saving the char file
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

think of it as a char file being saved over as a new player every time they log in how would i fix it??

Read full topic
item.source: Auto save as in saving the char file

item.title: Auto save as in saving the char file
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

What exactly do you mean by over written ?
Make sure you
*Saved after making changes
*Compile after making changes

If you haven’t, then do it. If you have, make sure that your server is offline when compiling
If that doesn’t help, then sorry :l

Read full topic
item.source: Auto save as in saving the char file
